text:
e="preserve">Johnny Leeze (born John Glen; 31 December 1941 – 25 October 2020) was a British actor. He was best known for playing Harry Clayton in long running British soap opera "Coronation Street" for a few months in 1985, and as Ned Glover on the British soap opera "Emmerdale" from 1994 to 1999. He was born in York, England.
Leeze died on 25 October 2020 from COVID-19 in England at the age of 78.
